The causal chain of suffering [sn12.52:4: Craving is a condition for grasping
Grasping is a condition for continued existence
Continued existence is a condition for rebirth
Rebirth is a condition for old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress to come to be
The causal chain of the cessation of suf: Concentrating on the drawbacks of things
Old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease
The bonfire analogy (a causal chain) [sn: A bonfire burning with ten, twenty, thirty, or forty loads of wood
Someone tossing in dry grass, cow dung, or wood from time to time
The bonfire burning for a long time
No one tossing in dry grass, cow dung, or wood from time to time
The original fuel being used up and no more being added
The bonfire being extinguished due to lack of fuel
